title: Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the characters in the mobile game Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War. The characters are ranked from S Tier to C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on my own personal opinion and experience, and your own tier list may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.
heading: Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the characters in the mobile game Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War. The characters are ranked from S Tier to C Tier, with S Tier being the best and C Tier being the worst. The tier list is based on my own personal opinion and experience, and your own tier list may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.

data.itemDescription: The main protagonist of the Trails of Cold Steel series, Rean is a powerful swordsman with a wide range of arts and crafts. He is also a skilled strategist and leader, making him a valuable asset to any team

A fellow Class VII student and Rean's love interest, Laura is a skilled archer with a strong sense of justice. She is also a powerful physical attacker, and her S-Craft, "Valiant Strike," can deal massive damage to a single enemy

The healer of Class VII, Emma is a skilled apothecary with a wide range of healing and support arts. She is also a capable attacker, and her S-Craft, "Divine Miracle," can heal the entire party and grant them a temporary stat boost
A noble from the Erebonian Empire, Jusis is a skilled swordsman and mage. He is also a knowledgeable strategist, and his insights can be invaluable in battle

A tomboyish engineer from the Hexatheon family, Alisa is a skilled craftswoman with a knack for creating powerful gadgets. She is also a capable attacker, and her S-Craft, "Tessa Drive," can deal massive damage to all enemies

A commoner from the Republic of Jurai, Machias is a skilled swordsman with a strong sense of justice. He is also a capable attacker, and his S-Craft, "Thunderclap," can deal massive damage to a single enemy

A mysterious girl with a hidden past, Tio is a skilled mage with a wide range of offensive and support arts. She is also a capable attacker, and her S-Craft, "Pandora's Box," can deal massive damage to all enemies

A young boy with a powerful but unstable curse, Milliam is a skilled mage with a limited range of arts. However, his arts are all incredibly powerful, and his S-Craft, "Abyssal Gate," can deal massive damage to all enemies

An instructor at Thors Military Academy, Sara is a skilled swordsman with a strong sense of duty. She is also a capable attacker, and her S-Craft, "Crescent Blade," can deal massive damage to a single enemy
Milliam's older brother and a skilled swordsman, Kurt is a playable character in Trails of Cold Steel III and IV, but he is not available in Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War
A renowned musician and spy, Olivier is a playable character in Trails of Cold Steel I and II, but he is not available in Trails of Cold Steel: Northern War
